dict.acceptation: 明显的；显著的；平淡无奇的；自明；

sent.orig: All great truths are obvious truths. But not all obvious truths are great truths.
sent.trans: 伟大的真理都是明摆着的事实。但不见得所有明摆着的事实都是伟大的真理。

sent.orig: It's obvious Utah was frustrated, and it's obvious they realize the end is likely near.
sent.trans: 他们肯定是备受挫折的，形式也对他们越来越不妙了，一句话：时日无多啊。

sent.orig: The answers to this question range from the obvious to the not so obvious.
sent.trans: 回答这个问题，从明显的到不那么明显。

sent.orig: All great truths are obvious truths. But no all obvious truths are great truths.
sent.trans: 伟大的真理都是明摆着的事实，但并不是所有显而易见的事实都是伟大的真理。

sent.orig: There was no obvious person in charge, and no obvious plan being carried out.
sent.trans: 没有明确的负责人，没有明确的救灾计划出台。
